resources.string:
üìñ STORY:
Morning, 7:55 AM. The alarm is screaming and you have only 5 minutes to get to the football match. But where is your lucky sock?! You find only one... the other one is lost somewhere in the apartment. You must find it, or your team will lose!

üéØ GOAL:
Find the second red-white sock and get to the football match.

üó∫Ô∏è COMPLETE WALKTHROUGH:

‚òÖ START: BEDROOM
1. LOOK AROUND
2. Go to HALLWAY (‚¨áÔ∏è)

‚òÖ HALLWAY
3. TAKE STRING
4. Go to KITCHEN (‚¨ÖÔ∏è)

‚òÖ KITCHEN
5. READ NOTE
6. TAKE KEY
7. Return to HALLWAY (‚û°Ô∏è)

‚òÖ LIVING ROOM
8. From hallway go to LIVING ROOM (‚û°Ô∏è)
9. Interact with Muro (TALK/PET)
10. FEED MURO
11. Go UNDER COUCH (‚¨ÖÔ∏è)

‚òÖ UNDER THE COUCH
12. TAKE FABRIC
13. Return to LIVING ROOM

‚òÖ BALCONY
14. From living room go to BALCONY (‚û°Ô∏è)
15. Interact with pigeon (TALK)
16. USE STRING ON PIGEON
17. Return to LIVING ROOM (‚¨ÖÔ∏è)

‚òÖ BATHROOM
18. From hallway go to BATHROOM (‚¨áÔ∏è)
19. OPEN WASHER
20. Go to WASHER

‚òÖ WASHER
21. GIVE FABRIC TO CICA
22. Return to BATHROOM and HALLWAY

‚òÖ BEDROOM - SECRET CABINET
23. Return to BEDROOM (‚¨ÜÔ∏è)
24. USE SMALL KEY ON CABINET

‚òÖ FINALE - VICTORY!
25. Go to FINALE room
26. LOOK IN THE BAG
üéâ VICTORY! You found the second sock!

üí° TIPS:
‚Ä¢ Use compass arrows to move
‚Ä¢ "Actions" button shows available actions
‚Ä¢ Click on "Inventory" to view items
‚Ä¢ Some actions require items from inventory
‚Ä¢ Some rooms unlock after completing actions
‚Ä¢ TALK with NPCs for funny dialogues

üèÜ Congratulations! You solved the Sock Paradox!

Play time: ~10-15 minutes
Difficulty: Medium
Fun: High üéâ
The alarm is screaming ‚Äì it\'s 7:55. Only one sock lies on the floor. The bed is a mess and a cat meows somewhere.
A narrow hallway with a portrait of uncle and a coat on the hanger. A string lies on the floor.
A toothpaste battlefield. The washing machine hums suspiciously and the laundry basket is empty.
The smell of coffee fills the air. A note from wife and an apartment key lie on the counter.
Muro rules here. He sleeps on the couch and a piece of fabric sticks out from under it.
A small balcony with laundry hanging and a pigeon with artistic ambitions.
Under the couch you find a toy and a piece of fabric ‚Äì apparently part of the missing sock.
Cica jumps out of the washing machine. She holds a small key in her paws.
You returned to the bedroom and opened the locked cabinet. Inside is just a funny note.
You stand in the hallway with the coat and key. In the sports bag you find the second sock. Success!
Your lucky sock with the logo of your favorite football team.
The missing sock that caused all your problems.
A seemingly useless piece of string, but it might come in handy.
A metal key that will finally let you leave the apartment.
A chewed-up fragment of your missing sock.
Cica dropped it after some negotiation. It fits the small cabinet.
I went to mom\'s. Don\'t forget to feed the cat! And don\'t look for socks in the fridge.
The pigeon expressed himself artistically on it.
A small paper card with text: "In your favorite sports bag!"
Your lazy, confident cat who thinks he owns the apartment.
Muro lazily meows but refuses to move from the couch.
You pet Muro. He enjoys it but still doesn\'t move.
A curious and somewhat cunning cat who loves playing with socks.
Cica mysteriously meows and shows you a small shiny object.
Cica has something in her paws ‚Äì it looks like a small key!
A pigeon with the soul of an impressionist artist who likes to leave his mark.
Coo coo! The pigeon seems to be interested in shiny things.
You see only one sock. Where could the other one be?
You picked up the string. Maybe it will come in handy later.
You hear a quiet meow from inside. Something is there!
"I went to mom\'s. Don\'t forget to feed the cat! And don\'t look for socks in the fridge."
It\'s too heavy. Maybe Muro would move if you fed him.
Muro happily rolls off the couch and reveals a dark hole under it.
The pigeon flies away but later returns and leaves a gift on your jacket.
You picked up a piece of your missing sock.
Cica purrs contentedly and drops a small key.
You unlocked the cabinet. Inside is just a note.
Victory! You found the second sock and solved the Sock Paradox!
Congratulations, Fero! The Sock Paradox is solved!
Do you really want to quit the game?
